author: CNN Staff
title: Fact-checking Trump's marathon coronavirus briefing
description: Trump's marathon coronavirus press conference on Tuesday included the usual barrage of specific false claims. Here's a preliminary fact check of a couple of them that will be updated with a more substantial analysis of what was wide-ranging, more than two-hou…
